attributes.action: Provide coat hooks for all public toilets in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sure I am not the only person who has visited a public toilet and has had to place a coat on a dirty wet floor due to being nowhere to hang it. Have you ever thought of what you are acctually putting your coat, hat, gloves or scarf etc on to and what has been trodden into the cubicle. I wont even mention "spray and splashing" I dont think it would take too much to raise the standard on basic hygeine for all.
